body.p: The entity receives a single premium of CU15 at the beginning of the coverage period. Policyholders will receive the value of the account balance:

li.p: if the insured person dies during the coverage period; or
at the end of the coverage period (maturity value) if the insured person survives to the end of the coverage period.
